I am associate professor (docent) at the [Institute for Evaluation of Labour Market and Education Policy (IFAU)](https://www.ifau.se/en/) in Uppsala and am affiliated with the [Uppsala Center for Labor Studies (UCLS)](https://www.uu.se/en/department/economics/research/research-centres/uppsala-center-for-labor-studies) at Uppsala University, [ROA at Maastricht University](https://roa.nl), [IZA$@$LISER](https://www.iza.org), and [ROCKWOOL Foundation Berlin](https://www.rfberlin.com). 

My research interests are centred around learning and incentives in the workplace, origins and consequences of course choice in education, and gender differences in the labour market.

I edit the [NEP report on the economics of gender](https://econpapers.repec.org/scripts/nep.pf?list=nepgen) ([subscribe here](https://nep.repec.org/nep-gen.html)),  organise the [Stockholm Uppsala Economics of Education Workshop Series and other workshops](workshops.qmd), and occasionally write up useful commands on my [StataTeX Blog](https://statatexblog.com) for which I'm also teaching [Stata courses](http://courses.statatexblog.com).

Please [find my CV (pdf) here](https://jansauermann.github.io/files/fullcv_sauermann.pdf).
